subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

explanation_en: During the Mughal era, Raja Man Singh II was a ruler of Rajasthan. He was the son of Maharaja Man Singh I and grandson of Maharana Pratap Singh.
